name: Monster
text: —Goooo, oooohh!!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Ah, leave it to me!
Can you keep up with my speed!?

Alex kicked off the ground and
deftly dodged the powerful claw
approaching with a roar.

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha! Good, you're completely toying with it!
It's worth having shed that armor!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
It's got incredible power, but if
it doesn't hit, it's all wasted shots!
This is my new fighting style!

Upon landing, Alex fired an energy projectile.
The attack deeply pierced the monster and exploded.

name: Hitomi
text:
The monster is flinching!
It's working!

name: Ryusei
text:
But we can't defeat the monster
completely unless we destroy its core...!

name: Ganran
text:
Ah, as expected of a monster's heart,
it's protected by a rock-like outer shell.

name: Ganran
text:
Breaking that giant core will be some big work.
It's going to be tough...!

name: Monster
text: —Goooo, oooohh!!

At that moment, the monster lowered its stance and roared,
echoing like a growl throughout the volcano's interior.
It was as if it was charging power—

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Before it attacks,
we have to destroy the core...!
The power to break that size...

name: reXer (Volcano)
text: ...This suit, the symbol that [Player] observed my own potential and me.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
—Think. What only I can do in this form...
There must be a way to break through this situation!

Alex looked around.
There was magma radiating heat
so strongly it can cause a heat haze—

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
—[Player], everyone!
I'm going to "load" the surrounding
magma's heat into my Parallel Weapon!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
In the meantime...
just for a little while,
buy me some time and expose its core!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
—I will definitely shatter
that core with one shot!

At Alex's words,
the heroes nodded without hesitation.

name: Ganran
text:
Alright, leave it to us!
Since you've been keeping this guy in check for us until now!

name: Ryusei
text:
Yeah, now it's our turn!
Hito-chan, Ganran-san!
Let's lure the monster's attack!

name: Hitomi
text:
Yes! That skin protecting the core...
It seems very hard, but leave it to me!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Thank you, everyone!
[Player], I need operational support!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...Can everyone watching hear me!
I need your support too!
—Reboot Charge, deploy!

Alex, like a hunter aiming for prey, drew his bowstring,
lowered his stance, closed his eyes, and concentrated.

Then, the flight unit began to glow.
Scarlet and white, swirling flames swirled around Alex.

name: Ganran
text:
...Gahahaha!
It's finally the moment of truth!
I'm getting fired up!

name: Ryusei
text:
Alright, we'll support
you with all our might!

name: Ganran
text:
Alright, first, I'll go provoke the monster!
We have to peel off its outer shell!

Ganran gripped his hammer
tighter and smiled at [Player].

name: Hitomi
text:
Yes! Ryusei-san,
let's send power to Ganran-san together!

name: Ryusei
text:
Understood, Hito-chan!
[Player]-san, please!

Responding to their gazes,
[Player] operated the device and
sent ViewPower to the heroes.

Hitomi's microphone and
Ryusei's suit received the ViewPower,
emitting a brilliant glow.

name: Hitomi
text:
We're not alone!
We're all in this together!

name: Hitomi
text:
Listen to this song...!
—"Love Song"! LOVE ME☆HITO-MI~!

name: Ryusei
text:
I can still do so much
to be my own greatest hero!
Ganran-san, take it!

name: Ryusei
text:
Let's end this battle!
—"Health and Beauty"! Pose of Reverse!!

The energy overflowing from Hitomi's and
Ryusei's Parallel Weapons enveloped Ganran.

name: Ganran
text:
—Gahahaha! Power is surging through me!
With this, I won't lose!

At [Player]'s words,
Ganran nodded powerfully and kicked off the ground,
leaping towards the core.

However, it was above a sea of magma.
The merciless, super-high heat assaulted Ganran.

name: Ganran
text:
Ugh, oooh...!
Hot... isn't it...!?
But...!!

As if to blow away the seeping sweat,
Ganran laughed powerfully.

name: Ganran
text:
—Gahahaha!!
That much heat won't satisfy me!!

name: Ganran
text:
I'll engrave my technique onto your body!
—"Forging"! Schmieden Schatz-axt!!

The impact of Ganran's strike blasted away the
monster's rock-like outer shell.

name: Monster
text: —Goooo, oooohh!!

name: Ryusei
text:
We did it,
the monster's defense has weakened!

name: Ganran
text:
Tch, not a single scratch on the core, but...!
Now I can reach its heart!!

Ganran, recoiling from the attack,
shouted loudly towards Alex and [Player].

Confirming that,
[Player] began transferring ViewPower.

options.text: Lots of ViewPower is coming from the viewers!
Alex, let's settle this once and for all!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...Reboot, complete!
I will surpass my father—"reXer"!

Alex surpassed his limits and
drew his crossbow to its fullest extent.

The energy projectile,
having received much ViewPower,
glowed like lava that can melt everything.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Here I go, limit release!
Molten Drive... activate!
I'll burn it down from the front!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
This is my hunt!
—"Pursuit"! Overlimit Execution!

With tremendous speed, leaving a crimson trail,
the arrow fired by Alex pierced the monster's core.

name: Monster
text: —Gooooohh!!

The monster's core shattered,
glittering as it disappeared into the magma.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...Alright, hit!
It can't withstand this attack!!
—Whoa, whoa!?

—However, until its very last moment,
the giant monster thrashed around, flailing its tail.

That violent impact echoed throughout Choco Volcano,
triggering fierce earthquakes repeatedly.

name: Ganran
text:
Ugh, this lizard bastard...!
It won't give up...!
Whoa!?

name: Ganran
text:
This is not good!
Any more of this, and we'll be swallowed by the magma!!

name: Hitomi
text:
It's dangerous here!
We defeated the monster,
so let's evacuate quickly!

name: Ryusei
text:
Y-Yeah...!
But, at this rate, the magma will
flow into the village...!

Alex quietly watched as the monster completely vanished,
turning into specks of light.

Then, confirming that,
he turned to [Player].

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...[Player].
Do you still have ViewPower left?

options.text: Yes, the viewers supported me, so...
...But, what are you planning to do?

text:
At those words, Alex gazed directly
at [Player] with a serious expression.

His eyes still showed
a burning, indomitable will.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...[Player].
Can you send all of that ViewPower to me?

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
With my Parallel Weapon,
I'll absorb the heat from the overflowing magma.

name: Ganran
text:
...Y-You.
You're not thinking of absorbing the eruption's energy alone,
even partially, are you!?

name: Ryusei
text:
B-But, if you do that,
we don't know how much strain
it will put on you...!

name: Hitomi
text:
That's right!
It's too dangerous!

As the magma flow rapidly accelerated
and increased in temperature,
the heroes gazed at Alex.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
I know it's dangerous.
But... I want you to believe in me.
...Please.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
With this weapon...
if it's this weapon that embodies the weapon I envisioned...
Surely, I can do it.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
You all put yourselves on the line
so I could fight the monster, right?
So now... it's my turn.

At Alex's words,
everyone felt that there was no time to hesitate.

[Player] quietly operated the device.
And then—

[Player] sent all
their ViewPower to Alex.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...Thank you.
[Player], everyone.
...Just step back a little.

As if making a decision,
Alex smiled and gazed at his companions.

Then, having recieved the ViewPower,
he deployed his glowing white flight unit.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...Here I go!
I'll suppress it with this left arm!

Alex held his left arm over the crater
and poured power into his Parallel Weapon.

Then, Alex's flight unit began to spin at high speeds,
gathering the surrounding heat towards Alex.

The magma's heat attacked them as scorching winds,
strong enough to burn even the heroes' suits.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...Ugh, whoa!! I will protect!
This village, and the volcano... everyone!!

The three heroes nodded silently to each other,
then rushed to Alex and gripped his right hand.

name: Hitomi
text:
...At this moment,
we might not be able to do anything.
But...!

name: Ryusei
text:
We're with you too!
It's alright, it will definitely work out!
I... believe in you!!

name: Ganran
text:
Alright!
You don't have to say anything,
just show them your guts!!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text: Hitomi, Ryusei, Ganran...! Ah, leave it to me!!
[Player] joined hands with the heroes.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...[Player]!
Thank you, here I go!!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Hold on...
my... Parallel Weapon!!
—Haaahhh!!

The surging waves of magma,
the scorching hot winds,
enveloped the heroes like a tornado.

Red, white, blue, the swirling colors
of the flames, extinguished everything.

—And then, when the fiery vortex subsided,
and color returned to their vision.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...I'm alive. The eruption—!
...Has it subsided!?

The temperature near the crater,
which had been near critical point just moments before,
had dropped to a tolerable level—

And the lava that had been flowing around was now emitting white smoke,
indicating it was solidifying.

Though damaged by the heat,
Alex's left arm's Parallel Weapon had
successfully fulfilled its purpose.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...We did it!
We did it, everyone...!!

With relief,
perhaps even the strength supporting his body gave out,
Alex swayed as if about to collapse.

His body was firmly supported by
three heroes and one operator.

name: Ryusei
text:
—Good work, reXer-kun.
You truly... did your best!!

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha!!
I knew you could do it!

name: Ganran
text:
Iron Rule, number one!
'Trust your companions and look forward'!
...You did well, take a break.

name: Hitomi
text:
reXer-san, thank you very much!
I was scared, but...
I'm really glad I believed in reXer-san, in everyone!

To [Player]'s and everyone's words,
Alex smiled gently and shook his head in response.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Ah, I'm fine.
I used a little too much power,
and I can't move right now, but—

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...I did it.
I protected them, the villagers.

Alex closed his eyes and tightly squeezed
[Player]'s supporting hand.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...Hey, everyone.
I already told [Player], but—

Alex slowly sat up and
looked at each of the heroes.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
My... this form of me,
can you call me by my real name— Alex?

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
I will become a hero who surpasses my father.
...To proceed on my own path, in my own way.

To Alex who said that,
the heroes smiled happily and responded.

name: Hitomi
text:
—Yes, of course!
Alex-san!

name: Ryusei
text:
Alex-kun, huh!
Yeah, it's nice to meet you again!

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha! Alright, understood!
Alex, huh, that's a good name!

name: Ganran
text:
So, is reXer
your father's name?

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Ah, to be precise, it's my father's
hero name from "when he existed".

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
My father used to be active
under the name reXer as a
professional gamer and game developer.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...After he was devoured by a monster
and everyone forgot him, I inherited "reXer".

Alex gazed at the pillar of light,
which was likely entering from the distant crater.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...I still can't proudly say that
I'm a respectable, full-fledged hero. So—

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...My goal, of course,
will continue to be the cool hero, reXer.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
The hero who taught me my path.
...I intend to continue inheriting reXer.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Being both Alex and reXer.
I want to continue fighting as such a hero...
...from now on.

Alex smiled softly.
He enveloped [Player]'s hand and quietly muttered.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...Hey, [Player].
I wonder if I showed my father that
I'm doing my best in my own way.

[Player] gripped that hand
back and replied.

name: Ryusei
text:
That's a wonderful goal, Alex-kun!
I can't fall behind either—!

name: Ganran
text:
Ah, I also need to train a bit
with you for when Barte returns!

name: Hitomi
text:
Heheh, I'm sure Alex-san will be fine!
Let's do our best together!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Ah, thank you, everyone.
But, saying this when I'm so wobbly,
it's not very convincing, is it...

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
I'm alright now.
I can stand on my own feet and walk—
At that moment, the volcano shook again.

name: Hitomi
text:
...N-No way, is it
the monster's doing again!?

options.text: I think it's probably a different cause.

text:
The volcanic interior had undergone changes
due to the disappearance of the giant monster and
the suppression of the magma's heat.

Parts of the rock wall,
unable to withstand the changes,
naturally began to crumble.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...It seems better to stay out of Choco Volcano
until safety can be confirmed.

name: Ganran
text:
Ah, the rock wall nearby is starting to collapse too.
Ryusei, be careful.

name: Ryusei
text:
Yeah, I'm fine...
...Wait, everyone!
This light, could it be the rock cacao—

Ryusei, who peered into the depths of the collapsed rock wall, gasped.
At his reaction, the other heroes also turned their gaze.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Th-This is...!!
Could it be, all of it is rock cacao!?

name: Ganran
text:
This is...!
I've never seen this much before...

name: Hitomi
text:
It's so beautiful...
There's so much rock cacao,
this whole place is sparkling!

options.text: To think there's a place like this...!

text:
The sea of magma where the monster had been hiding.
Beyond the now solidified rock wall,
a massive vein of rock cacao existed.

The shimmering rock cacao, reflecting faint light,
illuminated the faces of the heroes who had protected the village.
Final Chapter - Thank You, With Love

name: Villagers
text:
To the hunters who saved the village!
With gratitude and respect beyond words—

name: Villagers
text: Cheers!!

The party venue was set up on the large stage
in the center of the village.

In front of [Player] and the others,
who were seated there, a lavish array of dishes was lined up.

name: reXer
text:
...Somehow, I'm a little restless.
I can really feel that they're happy,
and I'm glad, but still.

name: Hitomi
text:
I'm surprised to
receive such a feast...!

name: Ryusei
text:
Y-Yeah.
Originally, we were planning to film the
village's meal scenery for ChocoFull...

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha!
It feels strange for me to be sitting here too,
but it's the will of all the villagers!

name: Ganran
text:
They urgently requested to hold a banquet of gratitude!
Please relax and enjoy yourselves!

options.text: It's a bit embarrassing, isn't it...!
I'm relieved that the villagers seem safe.
Can we eat all of this!?

name: Obsidius
text:
—Gahahaha!!
You don't need to hold back,
it's a token of the villagers' gratitude.

name: Obsidius
text:
They're probably very excited about you saving the village.
In times like these, it's best to accept it honestly, right?

Obsidius walked over to [Player] and the others,
munching heartily on the feast.

name: Hitomi
text:
Obsidius-san!
Thank you very much for coming to
help us at the volcano earlier!

name: Obsidius
text:
I never thought the big guy would be
defeated by the time I arrived!

name: Ganran
text:
Teach, it was a great help that you came!
I don't know about geology or mountain conditions.
It would have been dangerous if we had moved carelessly.

name: Ryusei
text:
Yeah, the rock wall also collapsed.
When you arrived, I was so relieved—!

name: Obsidius
text:
Well, I'm not really an expert,
I just happen to have some knowledge from rock excavation.
If I could be of help, that's for the better.

name: Obsidius
text:
Well, it's still an unpredictable situation, but...
In my estimation, it won't erupt immediately.

name: Obsidius
text:
I also contacted an acquaintance who is a volcanologist.
Now, let's leave the rest to the experts.

name: reXer
text:
Besides, we were able to save this village because
Obsidius and the others carried out evacuation guidance
while we were in the volcano.

name: Ganran
text:
Ah, that's right!
There was no damage to this village
at the foot of the mountain!

name: Obsidius
text:
Gahahaha!
That's thanks to the NeoTalents staff running around!
Thanks to them, I'm getting to enjoy this delicious meal too!

Swallowing his food,
Obsidius smiled at Alex.

name: Obsidius
text:
You are truly the heroes who saved the village!
[Player], reXer and the others, you all really did your best!

name: Obsidius
text:
Oops...
Should I call you Alex now?

name: reXer
text:
Ah, thank you, Obsidius.
But either is fine.
Both are important names to "me"!

name: Obsidius
text:
I see, Alex.
You... in this short time, you've started to
make quite a good face, haven't you!

name: reXer
text:
Hahah, thank you.
Maybe it's because I'm close to finding my own answer
to the things I was worried about!
Alex looked up and smiled back at Obsidius.
A cool breeze swept through the dim twilight sky.

options.text: I'm relieved that the villagers seem safe.

name: reXer
text:
...It's like spring.
Since it was scorching hot just a moment ago,
the wind feels very pleasant.

name: Ryusei
text:
It was cold when we were still on Earth, wasn't it?
I wonder if it'll be warm by the time we finish filming and go back?

name: Hitomi
text:
Heheh, that's right!
It feels like we've gone through all
four seasons in just a few days.

Each of the heroes reflected on the time
since they arrived in Garunderra.

At that moment, Obsidius received a signal
from a villager and happily called out.

name: Obsidius
text:
—Hey, everyone! Fireworks are about to go off!
And they say they have something they want to give you too?

name: reXer
text:
Th-They'll do that much for us...!?
What they want to give us is—

Alex turned around, and there, numerous chocolate-like
items were neatly lined up everywhere.

Packaged ones, unusually shaped ones...
many chocolates were offered to the hunters.

name: Obsidius
text:
The staff and villagers prepared plenty of
both Earth-style and Garunderra-style!

name: Hitomi
text:
This... is amazing!
The cultural exchange of chocolate's charm...!
It's truly "ChocoFull"!

name: Ryusei
text:
Hahaha!
They've given us an act
of returning love again!

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha!
The villagers also want to celebrate
for any reason they can find!

name: Ganran
text:
Alex and the others,
since you're already here,
please enjoy yourselves!

name: reXer
text:
Ah, [Player]! Let's start filming!
Let's enjoy it together!

options.text: I've been filming the whole time!

name: reXer
text:
Eh...! S-Seriously!?
I messed up again, me...!

name: reXer
text:
Can someone cut this part out!
...Pfft... -Hahaha!

name: Ryusei
text:
Ah, [Player]-san, Alex-kun!
Look, over there, they're going up!

Ryusei pointed to the dim twilight sky.
There, large fireworks bloomed, sparkling on the heroes' faces.

name: Kouki
text:
Now, we return
to the studio!

name: Danzo
text:
—Hey, hey, heeeey!!
You guys did some pretty Hot and Melt-y things, didn't you!?

name: Kouki
text:
Things you couldn't imagine were happening
during the Garunderra shoot...!

name: Danzo
text:
As expected of the elite Choco Hunters!
They handled major troubles perfectly, and successfully
returned triumphant with the best possible ending!

name: Kouki
text:
Of course, they've returned
to the studio too!

name: Kouki
text:
The three Choco Hunters,
and as a guest, Ganran-san,
who served as our guide!

name: Kouki
text:
And [Player]-san, who was in charge of the camera
and operations, please welcome them!

The spotlight turned to [Player] and the others
in the studio's kitchen booth.

name: reXer
text:
...I'm back, everyone watching!
This is reXer, the Choco Hunter—
or rather, Alex!

name: reXer
text:
There's so much I want to report,
but since then, we successfully excavated
a large amount of newly discovered rock cacao!

name: Ryusei
text:
We processed the rock cacao with a special
method to make it edible, crushing it into powder!
We've also reported on that process!

name: Hitomi
text:
And this is the rock cacao powder!
It's so beautiful!

Hitomi showed the camera the powder,
which glittered with rainbow colors each time
it caught the light.

name: Danzo
text:
OKOK, you guys completely cleared the mission to
confirm the rumor of the phantom chocolate, didn't you!?

name: Danzo
text:
I want to hear all about the battle with the monster later,
but first, welcome back, everyone~!

name: Kouki
text:
Today's broadcast, at last!
You'll be making chocolate by hand
from the rock cacao you obtained!

name: Hitomi
text:
Ganran-san, [Player]-san!
If you have any advice on how to make it, please tell us!

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha! I'm not a food craftsman,
but I can tell you what I know!

name: Ganran
text:
Rock cacao is different from Earth cacao;
it hardens quickly when the temperature drops, so be careful!

name: reXer
text:
Ah, but if that's the case, it seems it'll be finished during the show.
We have a lot of rock cacao, so Ganran, you try making some too!

name: Ryusei
text:
Alright, the phantom chocolate!
Let's make it by hand!
Everyone, let's do our best!

name: All Four
text: Oh—!!

options.text: It's been a truly long journey...

text:
Ganran and Alex and the others each took their tools
and began preparing the phantom chocolate.

Seeing that, Kouki and Danzo,
who were hosting, grinned.

name: Kouki
text:
...Now, the Choco Hunters are making chocolate by hand,
but actually, we have a surprise here!

name: Danzo
text:
That's right!
Actually, we've received a video letter from "a certain person"!
Right, Kouki-ku~n?

name: Kouki
text:
Yes! While the Choco Hunters are making chocolate,
please watch this video.

name: reXer
text:
A video letter?
...Huh, nobody told me about that.

name: Hitomi
text:
Hmm, who is it that
might send us a message...?

name: Danzo
text:
Booop, guessing time's up!
Well, surprise is all about the unexpected!
Anyway, let's watch, hit the button!

With Danzo's signal,
a holographic image appeared in the studio.

The familiar scenery of Garunderra
village was projected.

name: Boy
text:
—Um, this...
Is it already recording?

name: Ryusei
text:
...Ah! It's the child who
told us about rock cacao!

name: Hitomi
text:
You're right!
I wonder if he was able to make chocolate
with the rock cacao we gave him?

name: Boy
text:
...Alright.
Um, hello!

name: Boy
text:
After you brothers left, I got a little lonely,
but many people started coming to visit the village.

name: Boy
text:
So, I...
about the rock cacao I
received from you brothers—

The boy said that,
then took out the rock cacao he had been holding behind his back.

name: reXer
text:
...Huh? It's still rock cacao.
He hasn't made chocolate...?

name: Hitomi
text:
C-Could it be...
he gave up...?

name: Ryusei
text:
...No, let's watch
until the very end!

name: Boy
text:
—I thought about it a lot.
Even though I received it, I decided to be brave
and convey my feelings with my own strength!

name: Boy
text:
...So, I decided to make this rock cacao a precious treasure,
a memento of the courage I received from you brothers!

name: Boy
text:
I'll try my best!
When I meet you again,
I'll be able to tell you that I have worked hard!

name: Boy
text:
Thank you so much!
Choco Hunters!!

options.text: With this, we can rest assured!

name: Ryusei
text:
...Yeah, yeah!
That's good...!

At the message from the boy,
Ryusei raised a voice of delight as if
it were his own success.

name: Kouki
text:
...Heheh, how was it?
That was a surprise from the show—!

name: Danzo
text:
YoYoYo, this is what they call an "ambassador of love," huh!?
You guys are really "ChocoFull"!
You can do it, can't you!? Right, right, right!?

name: Danzo
text:
...Alrighty! You've seen the video letter,
but how's the phantom chocolate cooking coming along?

Danzo and Kouki headed towards the kitchen booth,
checking on the hunters' progress.

Already, a sweet aroma wafted through the air,
and the hunters were seen making their own unique chocolates.

name: reXer
text:
...Ah, I practiced chocolate making for this day!
I'll show off the results of my efforts!

name: Hitomi
text:
Yes, actually, I also researched various chocolates
and studied how to make them delicious!

name: Danzo
text:
Whew, full of confidence!
This really sounds promising!

As Danzo clapped,
Kouki also continued cheerfully.

name: Kouki
text:
...Now then!
The thing everyone is most curious about—

name: Kouki
text:
The Choco Hunters,
to whom will they give the phantom chocolate?
I'd like to ask!

Hitomi, illuminated by the spotlight,
held a finished phantom chocolate carefully
in a box and faced the camera.

name: Hitomi
text:
—Yes! I want to give it to
my father and mother... to my family!

name: Hitomi
text:
They always love me, support me, and worry about me...
I love those two very much!

The spotlight moved to
Ryusei next to her.

name: Ryusei
text:
—I want to give it to myself.
To myself, with love!

name: Ryusei
text:
To my current self whom I love so much,
and to my past self who created this me.
I learned so many things on this journey!

Next, it was Ganran
who finished his chocolate.

name: Ganran
text:
—I'll give it to my blade-obsessed idiot apprentice.
I still don't know when she'll return, but...

name: Ganran
text:
As his master, to welcome her back,
I'll have to make it for her again then!

And finally, Alex was
illuminated by the spotlight.

name: reXer
text:
—I want to give it to my precious person.
To my beloved reXer.

name: reXer
text:
There are countless things I want to tell him, and things I want to ask him...
But I'll put all those feelings into this chocolate.

Everyone picked up their respective
boxes carefully and stood up.

name: Danzo
text:
...I see.
This is good, good,
nothing but passionate stories!

name: Danzo
text:
This calls for a separate segment,
where each person tells their episode!
Right, Director-chan!?

name: Danzo
text:
By the way, Hunters,
I'm sure you've already written "that" down, yeah?

At Danzo's words,
the four laughed and nodded in response.

Then, each of them
took out a letter envelope.

name: Danzo
text:
...What?
Hold on, what's going on!?
If I'm not mistaken—

name: Danzo
text:
Everyone wrote two letters!?
One was enough, the "letter filled with feelings"!

name: reXer
text:
...Ah, but one just
wasn't enough, you see.

name: Hitomi
text:
I'm the same!
I have one more person I want to give it to,
so I prepared two letters!

name: Hitomi
text:
Honestly, even two
isn't enough, but...!

name: Ryusei
text:
The final mission—
to send the "phantom chocolate" and "letter filled with feelings"
to the person you want to convey your love to, right!?

name: Ryusei
text:
Since it was a mission that arrived after the shoot,
[Player]-san didn't know about it, right?

name: Ganran
text:
Since it was a special occasion,
the staff even prepared an envelope for me!
It's been a long time since I wrote a letter!

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha!
But I understand why everyone prepared two letters.
You were probably thinking the same thing, right?

name: reXer
text:
That's right!
One letter is for the person I want to give the phantom chocolate to—
and the other to the beloved person I just confessed to.

The four heroes exchanged glances
and laughed refreshingly.

name: All Four
text: And the other letter is for—

name: Hitomi
text:
—The person indispensable when talking about this journey!
I'm glad you were with us!

name: reXer
text:
—It's proof that you faced the crisis with us!
Because you were here, I could fight!

name: Ryusei
text:
—You supported us even when we were off-duty!
Your kindness made me happy!

name: Ganran
text:
—Ah, I relied on you a lot!
I'm glad I met you!

Four boxes and four letters.
They were offered to [Player].

name: All Four
text:
With gratitude and love—
This is for you!
I'm giving this to you!
Allow me to present this to you!
I'm giving it to ya!

note:
It isn't mentioned explicitly, but I'll color them based on who
the dialogue sound like they'd belong to!

name: All Four
text:
Receive this chocolate—
Please take it!
Go on, accept it!
Please kindly accept it!
Go on and take it!

name: Danzo
text:
...Whoa, this is a more unexpected development than expected.
This is interesting in its own way, isn't it!?

name: Kouki
text:
—Now, [Player]-san!
Whose chocolate will you accept!?

Live a Hero! Special Edition
"From Choco Volcano, With Love"
—END
